Question: Beijing Cozyla Technology Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Cozyla Technology Ltd.

Product: Cozyla Digital Picture Frames

- Alexa Built-in 10.1" WiFi HD Touch Screen Digital Frame
- Available in Bamboo, Black, Mat, and Walnut finishes
- 17" WiFi HD Touch Screen Large Digital Frame

Cozyla Portable Smart TVs

- 24" and 32" Portable TV Large Tablet Battery Powered Touchscreen Stanbyme Smart TV Kitchen TV
- Available in Black finish

These products offer digital picture frames with Alexa integration, high-definition touch screens, and various finishes. The portable smart TVs come in 24" and 32" sizes, featuring battery-powered touchscreens suitable for kitchen use, with a black finish option.
